Title: All About That Paper
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Franklin Hardy, Shane Kosakowski, Eva Anderson (executive story editor), Alison Bennett (executive story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Jimmy spends the day with an eccentric author on a day-long job interview. Gretchen deals with a work crisis. Edgar discovers the magic of improv comedy. And Lindsay gets served with divorce papers.
